title: His Ducking Alpha Dragon
description: My ducking hoard is a joke, one where the punchline is loneliness.When my internet goes out and the hottie cable guy arrives to save the day, I’m sure I’ve met my mate. Everything goes He flirts.I flirt.It’s a flirting extravaganza.And then he asks what all guys Is this your grandma’s house? Because what alpha lives surrounded by duck figurines and statues and paintings and even ducky chair cushions? Only with this guy it’s worse because I think he’s my mate. What omega dreams of settling down with a dragon mate whose hoard is made of ducks? Exactly none. Thanks, Grandma.His Ducking Alpha Dragon is a sweet with knotty heat MM Mpreg romance featuring an omega human who hates his job and is one step away from quitting, an alpha dragon with the most embarrassing hoard, the grandmother responsible for said hoard, true love, fated mates, eggs, a cozy nest, meggs, an adorable baby, and a guaranteed happy ever after.
author: Lorelei M. Hart
